title: Orange Is The New Black's Laura Prepon pregnant with second child
text:
Laura Prepon will become a mother of two.

On Thursday the Orange Is The New Black actress revealed she is pregnant with her second child. Her husband is actor Ben Foster who is best known for the film Hell Or High Water.

'We are so excited to announce that our family is growing. Life is beautiful! #knockedup,' the 39-year-old actress captioned a photo. She was with her daughter Ella, aged two.

Oh mama! Laura Prepon will become a mother of two. On Thursday the Orange Is The New Black actress revealed she is pregnant with her second child. Seen with husband Ben Foster in June 2018

Her sweet note: 'We are so excited to announce that our family is growing. Life is beautiful! #knockedup,' the 39-year-old actress captioned a photo. She was with her daughter Ella, aged two

In the new Instagram photo, Laura already looked to be about six months along as her bump pushed out while in a black outfit.

Laura and Ben were friends for many years before they started dating in the summer of 2015. In October 2016 they said they were engaged and then in August 2017 they welcomed their first child.

In June 2018 the lovebirds tied the knot, sharing the news with a tweet: 'Just Married! Thank you for all the love and support. Wishing all of us the good stuff!'

Foster gained prominence with many fans and critics with his stunning performances in the hit HBO drama Six Feet Under (2003-2005).

With baby #1: Here the power couple are seen in New York City in July 2018

He's also best known for his roles in films including The Punisher (2004), X-Men: The Last Stand (2006), Alpha Dog (2006), Contraband (2012), Lone Survivors (2013) and Leave No Trace (2018).

Netflix announced OITNB would end after season seven in a social media post in October 2018 titled, 'Warning: This may make you cry. The Final Season, 2019. #OITNB', along with a video.

Prepon and co-stars Taylor Schilling, Uzo Aduba and Kate Mulgrew joined their cast-mates for a touching minute-long clip thanking the fans, praising the show, and promising to go out with a bang.

Glam for the carpet: Here the siren is seen in July at the OITNB premiere

Based on Piper Kerman's 2010 memoir, Orange Is the New Black: My Year in a Women's Prison, OITNB debuted on Netflix in July of 2013.

It has since garnered 16 Emmy nominations and four wins along the way.

The final season of Orange is The New Black arrived on Netflix July 26.
description: 'We are so excited to announce that our family is growing. Life is beautiful! #knockedup,' the 39-year-old  actress captioned a photo. She was with her daughter Ella, aged two.
